column4: what is it that you want from 12.04?  Compiling/installing it yourself might be easiest
as long as there aren't a ton of dependencies, of course
libow-perl (https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/precise/i386/libow-perl), It doesn't have any unusual dependencies outside of the associated libow and owfs stuff
The problem is that all the install instructions I can find are old and complicated
